status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.body: Extra info, it's a dialog with a Webview inside.

Hello,
Thanks for reporting.  Please give us test code and step to reproduce so that we are able to reproduce this issue and dig deep. Please let us know your min and target SDK version of android and your environment details. 
Thanks
